A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I found The Last Jedi to be a powerful emotional experience. This film was very much a Shakespearean answer to many of the \"Kiddie\" episodes that had come before it such as Phantom Menace\, Return of the Jedi\, and in its own ways Force Awakens. It addressed many long burning questions from other films in the series\, and it wasn't afraid to shine a light on previous inconsistencies. These answers are going to burn bridges with some fans. So be it. Hamill and Fischer possibly gave the strongest performances of their careers\, 30 years later\, in the roles that made them household names. Fitting.
